channel.title: Shortcodes on Accelerators Template
channel.description: Recent content in Shortcodes on Accelerators Template

item.title: Notice
item.description: There are 4 types of notice add structure to your page. Note {{% notice note %}} This is a note {{% /notice %}} renders as This is a note Info {{% notice info %}} An information notice {{% /notice %}} renders as An information notice Tip {{% notice tip %}} A tip notice {{% /notice %}} renders as A tip notice Warning {{% notice warning %}} A warning notice {{% /notice %}} renders as

item.title: Mermaid
item.description: Mermaid is a library that generates charts and diagrams in markdown. Gantt Chart Gantt charts are used to demonstrate how long an accelerator will take. {{<mermaid>}} gantt dateFormat HH-mm axisFormat %M section 1. Step 1 1h :step1, 00-00, 1m section 2. Step 2 2h :step2, after step1, 2m section 3. Step 3 3h :step3, after step2, 3m {{</mermaid>}} Renders to: gantt dateFormat HH-mm axisFormat %M section 1. Step 1 1h :step1, 00-00, 1m section 2.

item.title: Tabs
item.description: Tabs can be handy for providing code snippets for multiple languages or providing configuration in different formats. {{< tabs groupId="tab_id" >}} {{% tab name="Tab 1" %}} ### Tab 1 {{% /tab %}} {{% tab name="Tab 2" %}} ### Tab 2 {{% /tab %}} {{</tabs >}} Tab 1 Tab 2 Tab 1 Tab 2

item.title: Attachments
item.description: The Attachments shortcode displays a list of files attached to a page. This is useful for providing sample data and notebooks. The attachments need to be placed in a pages.files folder. For example, if a page is named test_page attachments need to be added to a folder called test_page.files. {{%attachments style="blue"/%}} renders to Attachments sample-attachment.txt (27 B)
